attributes.action: Stop the outrageous use of Video games as alibi's and excuses in court cases involving minors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I see all too often in the media video games being used as reasons why minors do things such as attack others there age, steal, etc. This gives video games, a proud and worthy industry, a tarnished face. I would like to stop the use of computer/video games in testimonies, blaming games influences on children doing things that are not caused by gaming, but things like peer pressure.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
